When discussing his illegal plan to build the wall, Trump just admitted, "I didn't need to do this, but I'd rather do it much faster."

Does that sound like a legitimate national emergency to anyone? It certainly doesn't to me. I bet it won't to the courts either.

html: The #GLOBEAct also ensures that #LGBTI individuals who face persecution have fair access to U.S. asylum and refugee programs. I am proud to have @RepZoeLofgren, Ranking Member of the Subcmte on Immigration and Border Security, join me in introducing this bill.
text: The #GLOBEAct also ensures that #LGBTI individuals who face persecution have fair access to U.S. asylum and refugee programs. I am proud to have @RepZoeLofgren, Ranking Member of the Subcmte on Immigration and Border Security, join me in introducing this bill.

html: I am proud to have @RepEliotEngel, next Chair of the House Foreign Affairs Committee, join me in introducing the #GLOBEAct to call for U.S. leadership in multilateral organizations in the fight for #LGBTI rights.
text: I am proud to have @RepEliotEngel, next Chair of the House Foreign Affairs Committee, join me in introducing the #GLOBEAct to call for U.S. leadership in multilateral organizations in the fight for #LGBTI rights.

html: The #GLOBEAct would ensure that U.S. foreign assistance and global health programs are inclusive of #LGBTI populations, including by repealing the #GlobalGagRule, a fight @NitaLowey has helped lead.
text: The #GLOBEAct would ensure that U.S. foreign assistance and global health programs are inclusive of #LGBTI populations, including by repealing the #GlobalGagRule, a fight @NitaLowey has helped lead.

html: The bill also builds on the work of @RepLowenthal's International Human Rights Defense Act to codify the Special Envoy for the Human Rights of #LGBTI persons at @StateDept #GLOBEAct
text: The bill also builds on the work of @RepLowenthal's International Human Rights Defense Act to codify the Special Envoy for the Human Rights of #LGBTI persons at @StateDept #GLOBEAct

html: The #GLOBEAct builds on the work of @davidcicilline's Global Respect Act to use sanctions to punish those responsible for egregious murders of and abuses directed at LGBTI populations.
text: The #GLOBEAct builds on the work of @davidcicilline's Global Respect Act to use sanctions to punish those responsible for egregious murders of and abuses directed at LGBTI populations.

html: Today I introduced the #GLOBEAct to outline a vision for U.S. leadership in the protection of the rights of #LGBTI individuals around the world. Congress will not stand idly by as the Trump Admin. fails to acknowledge and respond to bigotry and violence against LGBTI people. pic.twitter.com/CLLVRlrP6g
text: Today I introduced the #GLOBEAct to outline a vision for U.S. leadership in the protection of the rights of #LGBTI individuals around the world. html: On #VeteransDay we pause to honor the brave Airmen, Soldiers, Sailors, Marines, and Coast Guardsmen who have served our country in the armed forces. Their sacrifice and commitment to American ideals have helped shape our democracy and remind us of what unites us.
text: On #VeteransDay we pause to honor the brave Airmen, Soldiers, Sailors, Marines, and Coast Guardsmen who have served our country in the armed forces. Their sacrifice and commitment to American ideals have helped shape our democracy and remind us of what unites us.

html: Our veterans of all war eras, men and women, LGBT, and of diverse backgrounds, deserve our deepest gratitude.
text: Our veterans of all war eras, men and women, LGBT, and of diverse backgrounds, deserve our deepest gratitude.

html: We can never fully repay them for their service and sacrifice; but we can do more to help our veterans in their transition to civilian life through access to quality education, careers, and more effective post-service care.
text: We can never fully repay them for their service and sacrifice; but we can do more to help our veterans in their transition to civilian life through access to quality education, careers, and more effective post-service care.

html: I hope you will join me in taking a moment this Veterans Day to reflect on the family member, friend, or stranger who answered the call to service. They deserve our thanks every day.
